title: Samsung releases kernel sources for the Galaxy S22 series
content:
After nearly everything was leaked about Samsung’s 2022 flagships, the Galaxy S22 series was finally made official last month. The phones represent the best of what the Korean OEM has to offer this year at different price ranges. We reviewed the Galaxy S22 Ultra with 12GB RAM, which offers truly massive potential for whatever use

The post Samsung releases kernel sources for the Galaxy S22 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung Galaxy S22 kernel sources are now available, meaning developers can now start third-party development for the devices. Read on to learn more.
